definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: This science fiction film lends itself well to wide screen.
sentences.chinese: 这部科幻电影是适合于宽银幕播放的。

sentences.english: A children’s science fiction movie, the ET won the Academy Award in 1982.
sentences.chinese: 一部儿童科幻电影，赢得过1982年的奥斯卡奖。

sentences.english: "The Matrix" rewrote the text book for movie science fiction.
sentences.chinese: 骇客帝国为科幻电影重新改写了教科书。

sentences.english: Instead, sci-fi films should be all about imagination.
sentences.chinese: 相反，科幻电影应该是充满想象力的。

sentences.english: Christian themes aren't an entirely new development in filmed science fiction, either.
sentences.chinese: 科幻电影中的基督教主题同样也不完全是新产物。

sentences.english: Wu believes it will take years for China to improve its sci-fi filmmaking.
sentences.chinese: 吴艳认为中国科幻电影制作业的发展尚需时日。

sentences.english: Fans can go to conventions based on the movies and books.
sentences.chinese: 科幻电影迷可以根据科幻电影或书籍中的情节聚会。

sentences.english: Fans can go to conventions based on the movies and books.
sentences.chinese: 科幻电影迷可以根据科幻电影或书籍中的情节聚会。

sentences.english: Just consider some recent fantasy and science fiction movies.
sentences.chinese: 只要想想一些最近的奇幻和科幻电影就知道了。

sentences.english: As the result, Sci-Fi movies about the light-speed are impossible to do.
sentences.chinese: 作为结果，科幻电影的光速是不可能的事情。

sentences.english: But which are the worst offenders when it comes to bad science films?
sentences.chinese: 然而谈到糟糕的科幻电影时哪些又是最差的罪人呢？

sentences.english: High-concept science-fiction movies tend to go in two different directions.
sentences.chinese: 高智商科幻电影通常有两种截然不同的路数。

sentences.english: It looked like the set of a science fiction film about the apocalypse.
sentences.chinese: 这就像科幻电影《现代启示录》里的场景。

sentences.english: In the scientific movie King Kong, the Empire State Building impresses the audience.
sentences.chinese: 在科幻电影《金刚》中，帝国大厦让观众印象深刻。

sentences.english: The whole movie is about my memories of the science fiction movies that I grew up with.
sentences.chinese: 整个电影是我对于伴我长大的科幻电影的回忆。

definition: science fiction/abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
Star Trek (US TV and film series)
